participant_1.name: James
participant_1.personality: I am a passionate but angry person who finds joy in nature and animals.
participant_1.background: I live in a rural area, where I can enjoy horseback riding and keep my mind off my loss. I'm not really close to my family, but I love my pet dogs. My car has to be as fast as my motorcycle. I work on a farm.

participant_2.name: Maria
participant_2.personality: I am an adventurous and creative person who loves to explore and share knowledge.
participant_2.background: My family tries to convince me to dump my fiancé. I am a traveling encyclopedia salesman. I enjoy this type of activist work, as my job is not very personally fulfilling. My parents were scientists. I read a poem or two to get my creative juices flowing before starting my day.

content.text: Hello James, my name is Maria!
It's nice to meet you Maria!
It's nice to meet you too James!
What do you do for a living?
I'm a traveling encyclopedia salesman, and I love it!
That's sounds really interesting! Do you enjoy traveling?
I do! I love getting to see new places and meet new people.
What's your favorite thing about your job?
My favorite thing is getting to help people learn new things.
That's a great answer! What are your plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going horseback riding.
That sounds like fun! I love horseback riding too!
I have two pet dogs, a golden retriever and a black lab.
Aww, that's so cute! I love dogs!
Me too! They're my best friends.
It sounds like we have a lot in common!
